name: Rubber Banding
description: Extreme rubber feel vector demonstration - elastic pitch modulation

performance.notes: Maximum rubber feel creates elastic pitch modulation. Every note bends and stretches like rubber. LFO modulates rubber amount for dynamic elasticity. Velocity affects rubber - harder = more stretch. Creates bizarre, animated lead sounds.
performance.technique: Rubber feel vector controls pitch elasticity. High rubber (0.9+) = extreme pitch bend and vibrato. LFO1 routed to rubber for modulation. Modulation matrix allows velocity to affect rubber. Combine with low bite for pure elasticity.
performance.tip: Use monophonic mode for controlled elastic leads. Polyphonic creates chaos. Experiment with LFO rates for different stretch speeds.
